page.title: 14LANIVET PLAYSCHOOL
page.content: The parish hall is used for a playschool. The children there are between 2\ years and 5 years.The supervisor is Mrs. Clarke and the helpers are Mrs. Godfrey, Mrs. Daw and Mrs. Pearce.The group which is run for Nanstallon toddlers as well has 12 boys and 8 girls.It owns a small roundabout, a slide, a trampolene and a first aid kit.Sometimes the children sit at tables and make things with dough or junk or they do jigsaws.They play with toys, look at books and have biscuits and milk.They meet twice a week, starting at 9-00am and finishing at noon. When it is someone's birthday they have a small party. There is a band which gets very noisy!
